name: Hangman Hero FREE
description:
Only you can save Hangman's life. Guess the words and save him from hanging at the gallows! Play alone or against your friends.

Forget paper and pen and play the classic game Hangman Hero on your smartphone or tablet. Guess all 150 missing words in this free version and get even more through in-app purchases to save the stick man again and again! You can also play in offline multiplayer mode against friends and try to guess their words. Funny animations and sounds help you finding your way through this macabre adventure.

Unlock exciting Achievements and compete with players online from all over the world in the Leaderboards.

Features:
- 1 and 2 player mode
- Word package "General"
- Cool animations and sounds
- Help functions
- High score tracking
- Facebook integration

Get more features:
- 8 new word packages with 150 words each
- Remove ads

Be a hero and save Hangmans's life!


If you like our Hangman Hero we are looking forward to receiving your rating in the store.

For questions or other feedback visit us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/mobivention
